echo360 is an active learning solution
for mostly higher ad and K through2
globally we service over 650 customers

platform that helps teachers and

before during and after class with a

ever make it on campus students use it
to uh review content to collaborate on
the content with their peers flag issues

with content both uh before class if

advance of having a
test the echo 360 Active Learning
platform leverages a number of AWS cloud
services for example we're heavy users
of ec2 we are using S3 for our primary
storage and Glacier for archiving which
is critical for our customers we use elb
for load balancing which is a huge uh
savings for us so we don't have to go
build or manage that ourselves we're
also leveraging the relational database
Dynamo DB which allows us to scale much
more readily across countries and in
terms of the content that we actually
manage store and archive so the reason
why we moved everything to the AWS Cloud
uh platform is because a it is a much
more robust solution that scales up and
down with load uh B it's highly reliable
data is redundant the application is
redundant the solution has a much higher
uptime when run in the cloud
implementation as opposed to an on-
premit a and the final benefit is it's
actually going to be cheaper in the long
run for the school itself to put the
solution in the cloud than to run it
themselves when there when spring break
things are very quiet during exam period
it gets very frenetic so we need a
dynamic scaling of our Solution by day
of week and hour of day if a school did
this themselves on premises it would
probably cost them approximately $35 per
student per year to operate we can
effectively do it for them at about $25
or almost a 30% reduction in cost even
when we're doing it and charging a
margin for
it we could not scale our business as
seamlessly without AWS cloud services
and we certainly couldn't do it on a

ourselves it would have been very
expensive we would have had to stand up

geographic regions and we would have to

Capac it up and down and we get all of
